text: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

translation.en.sahih: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Kami telah menghiasi langit yang dekat dengan bintang-bintang, dan Kami jadikan bintang-bintang itu alat-alat pelempar syaitan, dan Kami sediakan bagi mereka siksa neraka yang menyala-nyala.
